title: Mini Dragons
creator_credit: Richard Carey, INCA, Nihon Hoso Kyokai and Film Australia
brief_description: A series which look at the new economic powers of the Asian region - Taiwan, South Korea, Hong Kong and Singapore. Through the eyes of disparate individuals from each country the programs look at the historical context of the mini dragons’ current success and the unique problems they face in their bid to retain economic leadership in the area.
